EmailTemplate.name: 202011_Global_BGA_MSP-Promo_Email.Email
EmailTemplate.subject: Promo Pricing of G280 MSP-Mechanical Components Coverage
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear valued customer,
Because you are an active MSP Engines customer, Honeywell is offering a promotional pricing discount for the G280 MSP Mechanical Components program through the end of 2020.
The discount is 20% for Year 1 of the coverage and you will still enjoy the same level of service and benefits from MSP Mechanical Components.
If you have any questions or would like to see a quote, please reach out to your Honeywell point of contact or respond to this message.
We look forward to hearing from you soon!
Maintenance Service Plan MSP Components – Avionics and Mechanical <[[mailto:MSPAvionicsSales@Honeywell.com]]> Business and General Aviation Honeywell Aerospace
